skill.name: LoLLMs API Authentication
skill.description: How to generate and use API keys for authenticating with LoLLMs services.
skill.content:
# ðŸ”‘ LoLLMs API Authentication
To interact with LoLLMs services programmatically, you must provide a valid API key in the HTTP headers.
## Generating Your API Key 1. **Log in** to your LoLLMs WebUI account. 2. Navigate to **Settings** (bottom left or via User Profile). 3. Select the **API Keys** tab. 4. Enter an **Alias** for your key (e.g., "VS Code Extension"). 5. Click **Create New Key**. 6. **CRITICAL:** Copy the key immediately. It is only displayed once for security reasons.
## Usage in Headers Pass the key in the HTTP Authorization header for all requests: ```http Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY ```
If the administrator has disabled the requirement for keys, this header may be omitted.
